com.crowdin.client.core.model

Interface EnumConverter<T extends java.lang.Enum<T>>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - enum type
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AiReportFormat, AutoApproveOption, BooleanInt, Category, CharTransformation, ContentType, Currency, EntityType, EscapeQuotesMode, EscapeSpecialCharsMode, Event, ExportMode, ExportQuotes, FieldType, Gender, GlossariesFormat, GroupingParameter, IssueStatus, JsonFileType, LabelIncludeType, LanguageAccessPolicy, Mark, MatchType, Method, Mode, MtTranslateRequest.LanguageRecognitionProvider, OrganizationEvent, PartOfSpeech, PatchOperation, PluralCategoryName, PreTranslation.Status, Priority, ProjectPermissions, Reports2Format, ReportSettingsTemplate.Mode, ReportsFormat, RequestType, Status, Status, Status, Status, Status, Status, TextDirection, TmContextType, TranslationMemoryFormat, TranslatorRoleName, TwoFactor, Type, Type, Type, Type, Type, Type, TypeVendor, Unit, UpdateOption, UserPermissions, Validation, Visibility

    public interface EnumConverter<T extends java.lang.Enum<T>>
    Enum json converter. All enums will implement this interface. Enum which implements this interface should also contain static method for deserialization. See PatchOperation.from(java.lang.String) It is needed just to avoid hard dependencies on Jackson library

    • Method Summary
